snippet: In an M.L.B. Productions video, players discussed the most intimidating hitters in the games. In some cases, the pitchers do not have all that much to fear.
abstract: In an M.L.B. Productions video, players discussed the most intimidating hitters in the games. In some cases, the pitchers do not have all that much to fear.

headline.main: For Some Pitchers, No Reason for Fear
